events.name: Battery Pack Production
events.wd_description: Battery packs are produced through electrode manufacturing and cell fabrication, involving cleanroom conditions and significant capital investment.

events.name: Electrode Manufacturing
events.wd_description: Electrode manufacturing involves producing electrodes for battery cells under highly controlled conditions.

events.name: Cell Fabrication
events.wd_description: Cell fabrication requires cleanroom conditions to avoid impurities, with the final product being integrated into battery packs.

events.name: Battery Re-Use
events.wd_description: Batteries are refurbished for second-life applications such as stationary storage, involving disassembly, reassessment, and repackaging.
